item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 "Nice One "首次公开募股飙升 30%，IPO 热潮仍在继续
item.description: Nice One Beauty Digital Marketing Co.在利雅得首次公开募股 3.2 亿美元后，首日股价大涨，成为沙特阿拉伯最新一家开局强劲的上市企业。【原文：Nice One Beauty Digital Marketing Co. surged in its debut after a $320 million initial public offering in Riyadh, the latest listing in Saudi Arabia to see a strong start.】

item.title: 瑞典核心通胀放缓，瑞典央行松了一口气
item.description: 瑞典的核心通胀率在今年年底的放缓幅度超过了预期，这很可能引发人们对瑞典央行在一次降息计划之后继续扩大宽松政策的可能性产生疑问。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation rate slowed more than expected at the end of the year, likely sparking questions over the chances of the Riksbank extending easing beyond its one planned interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 印尼继续禁止销售 iPhone 16，AirTag 计划还不够
item.description: 印度尼西亚继续禁止销售苹果公司的 iPhone 16 设备，称其建设 AirTag 工厂的计划不符合当地投资要求。【原文：Indonesia has kept a ban on the sale of Apple Inc.’s iPhone 16 devices, saying its plan to build an AirTag factory does not meet local investment requirements.】

item.title: 壳牌天然气销量下降，2024 年底交易疲软
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）表示，在 2024 年的最后三个月里，该公司的天然气产量下降，燃料贸易收益减少。【原文：Shell Plc said it saw lower volumes of natural gas and weaker earnings from trading the fuel in the final three months of 2024.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单下降，肖尔茨已无时间解决增长问题
item.description: 就在德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）面临大选的几周前，德国工厂订单创下了三个月来的最大降幅，凸显了工业的困境。【原文：German factory orders dropped the most in three months, highlighting industry’s woes just weeks before Chancellor Olaf Scholz faces elections.】

item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：US Treasury 10-year yields can rise further to 5% as the economy hums along, a level that would offer a buying opportunity, according to Citigroup Inc.’s wealth division.】

印度将在预算案中简化沿用数十年的所得税申报规则
item.description: 印度政府计划简化所得税申报规则，以减少纳税人遵纪守法的繁琐程度，并帮助减少过去十年来已激增至 1200 多亿美元的争议。【原文：India’s government plans to simplify its income tax filing rules to make it less tedious for taxpayers to comply with the law and help cut down on disputes that have ballooned to more than $120 billion over the past decade.】

item.title: 扎克伯格解除美国内容护栏，做出对特朗普友好的转变
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司选择唐纳德-特朗普最喜欢的电视新闻节目《福克斯和朋友们》来讨论其放弃外部事实核查的决定绝非偶然。【原文：It was no accident that Meta Platforms Inc. chose Donald Trump’s favorite TV news show, Fox and Friends, to discuss its decision to ditch outside fact-checking.】

item.title: 印尼外汇储备再创新高，提升印尼盾的资产价值
item.description: 印尼的外汇储备在12月份增至1,557亿美元，创下了新的历史纪录，这增强了印尼央行抵御美元无情走强和稳定印尼盾的能力。【原文：Indonesia’s foreign reserves rose to a fresh record of $155.7 billion in December, bolstering the central bank’s defenses to fight the relentless dollar strength and stabilize the rupiah.】

item.description:
军方对导航信号的干扰破坏了严重依赖先进技术的农业配方。【原文：

The military’s jamming of navigational signals has undercut an agricultural formula that’s heavily dependent on advanced technologies.

】

item.description:

】

item.title: 印度钢铁巨头的煤炭交易在莫桑比克法律纠纷中被冻结
item.description: 印度最大的钢铁制造商因法律纠纷而被边缘化，该纠纷导致其在莫桑比克购买煤炭特许权的交易脱轨。【原文：India’s largest steelmaker has been sidelined by a legal dispute that’s derailed its deal to buy a coal concession in Mozambique.】

item.title: 本土市场举步维艰，中国投资者海外追逐回报
item.description: 中国投资者对海外更好回报的需求如此强烈，以至于一些基金的扩大购买配额也很快售罄。【原文：Chinese investors’ demand for better returns overseas is so strong that even an expanded purchase quota for some funds is selling out fast.】

item.title: 中国提高消费补贴，誓言提供更多资金刺激需求
item.description: 中国将为更多消费品提供补贴，并为工业设备升级提供更多资金，在出口面临越来越大的逆风的情况下，加强旨在促进国内消费的计划。【原文：China will subsidize more consumer products and boost funding for industrial equipment upgrades, ramping up a program aimed at bolstering domestic consumption in the face of growing headwinds for exports.】

item.title: 花旗集团预计 2025 年印度股市将因盈利增长 10
item.description: 花旗集团预计，在经济增长复苏和企业盈利强劲的推动下，印度 5 万亿美元的股市将连续第 10 年上涨。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is anticipating a 10th straight year of gains for India’s $5 trillion stock market, driven by a recovery in economic growth as well as robust corporate earnings.】

item.title: Ola Electric 因信息披露失误遭印度监管机构警告
item.description: 印度市场监管部门警告 Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 在向投资者发布信息之前，不得在社交媒体上发布公司的最新动态。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. was warned by India’s markets regulator against posting company updates on social media before disseminating information to its investors.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚寻求吸引投资者，非洲迎来新股票市场
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚在时隔五十年之后将开设一家证券交易所，这是该国为吸引投资者而采取的最新举措，该国正努力从内战中恢复过来，控制地区纷争。【原文：Ethiopia is opening a stock exchange after a five-decade gap, in its latest step to lure investors to a nation that’s struggling to control regional strife as it recovers from a civil war.】

item.title: 默克在销售低迷的情况下为男性注射人乳头瘤病毒疫苗获中国政府批准
item.description: 中国药品监管机构批准默克公司的畅销产品人类乳头瘤病毒（HPV）疫苗供男性使用，这为这家美国制药巨头开辟了一个新的未开发市场。【原文：China’s drug regulator approved Merck & Co.’s blockbuster HPV vaccine for use by men, opening a new untapped market for the US drug giant after a rush among women to get the shot lost steam.】

item.title: 印度考虑取消部分农作物期货交易禁令
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，印度正在考虑撤销对包括小麦和未加工大米在内的七种农产品期货交易为期三年的禁令，因为研究发现这些措施会适得其反。【原文：India is considering revoking a three-year ban on futures trading in seven farm commodities, including wheat and unprocessed rice, after studies found the steps were counterproductive, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: TikTok 和阿里巴巴迫使印尼电子商务先驱布卡拉帕克撤退
item.description: 印尼电子商务先驱 PT Bukalapak.com 将停止销售实物商品，这凸显了市场上残酷的竞争，ByteDance 有限公司的 TikTok Shop 和 Sea 有限公司的 Shopee 等都在争夺用户。【原文：Indonesian e-commerce pioneer PT Bukalapak.com will stop selling physical goods, underscoring the cut-throat competition in a market where the likes of ByteDance Ltd.’s TikTok Shop and Sea Ltd.’s Shopee are vying for users.】

item.title: 印度 Nifty 指数看涨者认为预算案公布前股市将陷入困境
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 变形金刚玩具制造商 Bloks 在香港疯狂上市，融资 2.15 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，奥特曼和变形金刚公仔的热门制造商 Bloks Group Ltd. 在香港募集了 16.7 亿港元（2.15 亿美元）资金，这是该公司在香港首次公开募股年的一次备受追捧的上市。【原文：Bloks Group Ltd., the popular maker of Ultraman and Transformers figurines, raised HK$1.67 billion ($215 million) in Hong Kong, people familiar with the matter said, in a keenly sought-after listing to help kick off the year for initial public offerings in the city.】

item.title: 香港机场管理局售出创纪录的 24 亿美元债券
item.description: 在航空业复苏乏力、机场扩建计划推迟的情况下，香港机场管理局出售了 185 亿港元（24 亿美元）的债券，这是该金融中心有史以来最大规模的本币债券发行。【原文：The Airport Authority of Hong Kong sold HK$18.5 billion ($2.4 billion) of bonds in the largest-ever issuance in the financial hub’s local currency, amid a sluggish recovery in the aviation sector and delays to the airport’s expansion plan.】

item.title: 萨利纳斯的 Total Play 公司提出 8.7 亿美元的债务转换要约
item.description: 墨西哥亿万富翁里卡多-萨利纳斯-普利戈（Ricardo Salinas Pliego）旗下的有线电视和互联网服务提供商 Total Play Telecomunicaciones 已提出将 2028 年到期的 6 亿美元无担保债券换成有担保票据的提议。【原文：Mexican billionaire Ricardo Salinas Pliego’s cable and internet provider Total Play Telecomunicaciones has launched an offer to swap $600 million of unsecured bonds due in 2028 for secured notes.】

item.title: 山姆-奥特曼的妹妹指控 OpenAI 首席执行官性侵她
item.description: 山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的妹妹在向联邦法院提起的诉讼中指控 OpenAI 首席执行官性虐待她近十年。【原文：The sister of Sam Altman accused the OpenAI chief executive officer of sexually abusing her for almost a decade, in a lawsuit filed in federal court.】

item.title: 被列入美国黑名单后，腾讯进行 2006 年以来最大规模回购
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）因涉嫌与中国军方有关联而被列入美国黑名单，引发大跌，此后该公司回购了近二十年来最多的股票。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. repurchased the most shares in nearly two decades after a selloff sparked by the tech firm’s addition to a US blacklist for alleged links to the Chinese military.】

item.title: 英伟达称三星在人工智能内存芯片设计方面面临挑战
item.description: 英伟达公司负责人黄仁勋表示，三星电子公司在生产用于人工智能系统的新型存储芯片时遇到了困难，但他表示相信合作公司会克服困难。【原文：Nvidia Corp. head Jensen Huang said that Samsung Electronics Co. has faced difficulties producing a new type of memory chip for AI systems, but he expressed confidence that the partner company would overcome the challenges.】

item.title: 拜登将推动地热能源促进人工智能发展
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乔-拜登总统的政府计划简化地热能源开发的许可程序，以此作为一项更广泛的行政命令的一部分，以促进人工智能数据中心的基础设施建设。【原文：President Joe Biden’s administration plans to streamline permitting for geothermal energy development as part of a broader executive order to boost infrastructure for AI data centers, according to people familiar with the matter.】
